\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}
\thispagestyle{empty}
\centering
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=2]
% body
\path (0, 0) [fill=gray] circle (1cm);
\path[rotate=-20, anchor=center] (-.45, -1.2) [fill=gray] ellipse (.75cm and 2cm);
\path[rotate=15, anchor=center] (-2.5, -1) [fill=gray] ellipse (2cm and 1cm);
% fins
\path [fill=gray, rotate=0, anchor=center] (-1.05, -1.35) -- ++(.8, 0) to[bend right] ++(.4, -1.5) -- ++(-.8, 0) to[bend left] cycle;
\path [rotate=60, anchor=center] (-2.1, -.05) [fill=gray!40!white] ellipse (1cm and .6cm);
\path (-2.25, -2.75) [fill=gray!40!white] ellipse (1cm and .3cm);
\path [rotate=35, anchor=center] (-2.6, -1.5) [fill=gray!40!white] ellipse (.7cm and .15cm);
\path [fill=gray!40!white] (-1.5, -3) to[bend left] (-3.9, -2.44) to[bend right] ++(2, .5) -- cycle;
\path [fill=gray] (-.99, .35) to[bend left] ++(-1.2, -.75) to[bend right] ++(-1.8, -1.2) -- ++(2, 0) -- cycle;
\path [fill=gray, rotate=20, anchor=center] (-2, -.9) -- ++(-1, 0) to[bend left] ++(-.4, -1.5) -- ++(1, 0) to[bend right] cycle;
\path [fill=gray] (-3.85, -1.5) to[bend right] ++(-.25, .5) -- ++(-1, -1.5) to[bend right] ++(1.5, .5) -- cycle;
% face
\path[rotate=20, anchor=center] (.5, -.4) [fill=gray!90!white] ellipse (.6cm and .5cm);
\path (.75, .4) [fill=black] circle (.1cm);
\path (.15, .25) [fill=black] circle (.1cm);
\path [fill=black, rotate=15, anchor=center] (.65, -.2) -- ++(.15, .2) -- ++(-.3, 0) -- cycle;
\path [draw=black] (.35, -.2) to[bend right] ++(-.6, .1);
\path [draw=black] (.35, -.25) to[bend right] ++(-.6, 0);
\path [draw=black] (.35, -.3) to[bend right] ++(-.6, -.1);
\path [draw=black] (1, 0) to[bend left] ++(.3, .3);
\path [draw=black] (1.025, -.025) to[bend left] ++(.3, .2);
\path [draw=black] (1.05, -.05) to[bend left] ++(.3, .1);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
